fullDescription.intro: This node adds a Keras Cropping 3D Layer to an existing deep learning network.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the second spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the third spatial dimension.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (spatial_dim1, spatial_dim2, spatial_dim3, channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, spatial_dim1, spatial_dim2, spatial_dim3)

ports.inPort: The network to append the layer to.
